about_the_game:
The official soundtrack for Little Goody Two Shoes features 64 all-original tracks from the main game, including 3 unreleased bonus tracks.

Immerse yourself in the dreamy world of Kieferberg with a whimsical and colourful collection of musical themes!

MP3 and FLAC versions included for all tracks.
detailed_description:
The official soundtrack for Little Goody Two Shoes features 64 all-original tracks from the main game, including 3 unreleased bonus tracks.

Immerse yourself in the dreamy world of Kieferberg with a whimsical and colourful collection of musical themes!

MP3 and FLAC versions included for all tracks.
